The Fortress Approach

The Fortress Approach: Investing in Legal Assets

For over a decade, Fortress has been a pioneer and leader in legal assets investing. The Fortress Legal Assets leadership team discusses the genesis of our business, and the opportunities we see ahead in this growing asset class.

Private Wealth Solutions

Fortress solutions, tailored for individuals

Today, individual investors can access the same expertise, experience, resources, and capabilities that have supported Fortress' success for more than 20 years as a manager for some of the world’s largest and most sophisticated investors.

Fortress Private Wealth Solutions seeks to deliver purpose-built, investor-oriented alternative investment solutions and resources to financial advisors and individuals.
